translations: n.甲虫；<英>画甲虫，拼甲虫（一种掷骰子游戏）；大槌；捶布机；（大众汽车公司生产的）甲壳虫汽车（Beetle）
v.匆匆地走；（人的眉毛）突出，悬垂；用大槌捶；用捶布机捶（布）

phrs.translation: n. 蜣螂；金龟子科；甲虫

sentences.sentence: He spied the beetle; the drooping tail lifted and wagged.
sentences.translation: 他发现了甲虫；下垂的尾巴翘了起来，摇摆着。

sentences.sentence: Healthy trees are also better able to fend off bark beetle.
sentences.translation: 健康的树木也能更好地抵御树皮甲虫。

sentences.sentence: The first thing the beetle did was to take him by the finger.
sentences.translation: 甲虫做的第一件事就是咬住他的手指。
